subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shenise Johnson scored 15 points and Marissa Coleman added 14 to help the Indiana Fever beat the visiting Minnesota Lynx, 75-69, forcing a decisive Game 5 in the W.N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Shenise Johnson scored 15 points and Marissa Coleman added 14 to help the Indiana Fever beat the visiting Minnesota Lynx, 75-69, forcing a decisive Game 5 in the W.N.B.A. finals.
